creditline: Gift of Rosemary and Elliot Offner in honor of Emily Offner Hollidge
description: nude male figure with drapery flowing around upper body; holds knife in PL hand; resting PR knee and foot on back of bull; PL foot on bull's rear PL hoof; PR hand holds bull's horn; mounted on paper (may have been cut from a book; three sides torn straight, one side cut)

markings: plate number printed below photograph on mount
portfolio: From From "The Tomb by Antonio Rossellino for the Cardinal of Portugal" portfolio
title: Base, Bull-Slayer
